article.title: BAE to Provide T-POD System for MQ-1C
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems, Nashua, New Hampshire, was awarded a $12,290,244 firm-fixed-price and cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for T-Pod Systems on the MQ-1C Unmanned Aircraft System.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
